rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 7 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 5:54 PM, 28 June 2025(Saturday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Pampanga, Batangas, Cavite and Bataan within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Bulacan(Marilao, Meycauayan, Obando, Dona Remedios Trinidad, San Miguel, San Ildefonso), Metro Manila(Malabon, Navotas, Valenzuela, Quezon City, Caloocan), Rizal(Rodriguez), Quezon(Tagkawayan, Polillo, Burdeos), Nueva Ecija(Guimba, Talugtug, Lupao, Carranglan, San Jose, Munoz, Nampicuan, Cuyapo), Tarlac(Moncada, San Manuel, Anao, Ramos, Paniqui, Camiling, San Clemente) and Laguna(Rizal, Nagcarlan, Liliw, Majayjay, Magdalena, Pila, Santa Cruz, Victoria, Pagsanjan, Luisiana) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
